name: Prostormer 5-Inch Random Orbital Sander with 21PCS Sandpapers, 8000-13000RPM, 2.6AMP Palm Sander with 6 Variable Speeds, Dust Collection For Polishing, Sanding
short_description: 6 Various Speed : The circular sanding tool offers precise control over grinding force and trajectory through adjustable speed settings, with a range of 8000 to 13000 rpm, ensuring exceptional work quality and efficiency

Dust Collection System : The integrated high-efficiency dust collection system, along with the dust collection box, effectively captures airborne particulates, thereby creating a cleaner working environment and safeguarding respiratory health

21 PCS Sanding Papers : The set of 21 pieces of sandpaper allows for the selection of various grit sizes depending on the specific task, ensuring competence from coarse grinding to fine polishing. It delivers excellent performance in polishing metals, wood, paint, and other materials

Ergonomic Design : The handle is designed to fit the natural curve of the palm, convenient one-hand operation, thereby reducing operator fatigue and enhancing overall balance. This design allows for stable operation over long periods of time
What You Will Get : 2.6 AMP Random Orbital Sander, 21 Pcs Sandpapers (7pcs 80 grits, 7pcs 100grits, 7pcs 120 grits), Dust Box, User Manual

name: Ingersoll Rand 311A Dual-Action Angle Air Sander, 6" Adhesive Pad, 12,000 rpm, 0.25 hp, Side Exhaust
short_description: QUIET ORBITAL AIR SANDER: This dual-action air sander is equipped with a built-in silencer for reduced noise and a 6" pad for swirl-free finishes. It offers 0.25 hp and 12,000 rpm.
CONVENIENT SILENT TOOL: This tool features a built-in adjustable regulator that allows for positive speed control and a compact size that lets you access tight, hard-to-reach spaces.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION: The dual-action sander tool has a balanced ball-bearing construction for improved stability and longevity and reduced vibration as you work. It’s great for feather edging, metal preparation, and finish work on body filler.
INNOVATIVE FEATURES: This powerful machine features a 3/8" hose size and a 1/4" air inlet. It weighs 4.2 lbs and has an air consumption at free speed of 17 cfm.
UNLOCK YOUR POTENTIAL: For 160 years, Ingersoll Rand has been committed to making life better by creating innovative, durable, and quality tools. Our legacy is reflected in every product we make.
product_description: The Ingersoll Rand 311A Air Dual-Action Sander is your go-to tool for achieving smooth, swirl-free finishes effortlessly. With a 6" pad diameter, this sander is perfect for feather edging, metal preparation, and finish work on body filler. It comes equipped with a built-in silencer that muffles noise during operation. Its compact size allows access to tight spaces, and its adjustable built-in regulator ensures precise speed control for optimal performance. Created with durable ball-bearing construction, this sander provides improved balance, reduced vibration, and a longer lifespan, making it a reliable choice for heavy-duty tasks. It has a low-vibration design that enhances user comfort and reduces fatigue during extended use, ensuring a smoother workflow. It features a 3/8" minimum hose size and a 1/4" air inlet to ensure compatibility with standard air tools. Featuring a maximum free speed of 12,000 rpm and a 0.25 hp motor, the 311A delivers powerful performance to tackle tough sanding jobs with ease. Weighing just 4.2 lbs, it’s lightweight and easy to maneuver, providing greater control and precision. Whether you’re a professional tradesperson or a DIY enthusiast, this dual-action sander offers professional-grade results, making it an essential addition to any workshop or tool collection. Ingersoll Rand is a trusted name in industrial innovation and excellence. With a rich legacy spanning over a century, Ingersoll Rand has continuously pushed the boundaries of engineering to deliver cutting-edge solutions that power progress across industries worldwide.

name: DEWALT Orbital Sander Kit, 5 inch, 3 amp, Corded, 12,000 OPM (DWE6421K)
short_description: 3.0 amp motor that spins the pad at 12,000 OPM
Shorter height allows the user to get closer to work piece
Separate counterweight design reduces vibration for improved comfort
Rubber over-mold in all of the critical areas of the sander
Improved dust-sealed switch to protect against dust ingestion for longer switch life
Improved dust collection and one-handed locking dust bag
Dust port is designed to fit directly to the DWV010 or DWV012 dust collectors
To attach dust port to other vacuum systems with 1-1/4 in. hoses, use DWV9000 Universal Quick Connector
product_description: The DWE6421K 5 in. Single Speed Random Orbit Sander Kit with hook & loop pad has a 3 amp motor that delivers 12,000 OPM. The separate counterweight reduces vibration and along with the rubber overmold grip provides comfortable sanding. A shorter design allows users to get closer to the work surface and the one-handed locking dust bag attaches securely to the sander to aid in dust collection or the user can attach the sander directly to the DWV010 or DWV012 dust collectors.

name: 5-Inch Random Orbital Sander, HYCHIKA 13000RPM Electric Orbital Sander with 6 Various Speeds, Palm Sander with 12 Pcs Sandpapers, 1 Pcs Dust Bag, Fit for Woodworking/Sanding
short_description: 🍁【6-Speed Variable Speed 】The 2.5A hand sander offers 6 variable speeds and can work from 6000-13000RPM, allowing you to easily match the correct speed from woodworking sanding to polishing, 30% increase in efficiency.

🍁【12Pcs Sanding Pads 】Random orbital sander with hook and loop design for quick change of sand paper. 12 pieces orbital sander sandpaper from coarse to fine, grit 80/120/240, can meet different scenarios of sanding, polishing, paint removal, rust removal, etc.

🍁【Efficient dust collection 】The wood sander tool optimizes dust collection through 8 vacuum holes at the bottom, ensuring 80% dust collection efficiency and providing a cleaner work space. Removable dust collection bag for easy cleaning.

🍁【Ergonomic Design】Light Mini orbital sander ; Texturized rubber covered molding grip is ergonomic, handheld design, easy to operate with one hand, effectively absorbs shock and reduces vibration during operation, improving your comfort and control of work.

🌈【What you get】1 x HYCHIKA electric sanders for wood, 4 x 80 grit sanding disc, 4 x 120 grit sanding disc, 4 x 240 grit sanding disc, 1 x operating instructions. If you have any questions about the sanding machine, please feel free to contact us.

name: Orbital Sander,2.4Amp 13000 OPM Random-Orbit Sanders 6 Variable Speeds with 15Pcs Sanding Discs 125mm, Electric Sander with Dust Collector for Sanding and Polishing
short_description: 2.4A High-Performance Sander: With a powerful 13000 RPM motor, this sander efficiently eliminates dust and smooths rough surfaces on wood, metal, and plastic

Quick Sanding for Large Surfaces: Our 4.9” sanding pad covers more area, enabling rapid sanding of large surfaces and tough materials. With an orbital stroke rate of 13000 OPM and a orbit diameter, this sander ensures efficient material elimination and a smooth finish
Efficient dust system: The circular sander's dust bag simplifies emptying, keeping the workspace dust-free. This convenient dust control enhances productivity and fosters a healthier work environment

Comfortable Ergonomics: This sander boasts an ergonomic handle with a rubberized grip for a secure and comfortable hold, ensuring maximum control during use. The lock-on button allows for continuous operation, enhancing user comfort and efficiency
What you get:1* Orbital Sander, 5* Sanding discs of 80 grits, 5* Sanding discs of 100 grits, 5*Sanding discs of 120 grits, 1* Dust collection bag, 1*User manual

name: Orbital Sander 3.8Amp 450W, HYCHIKA 6 Variable Speeds Double Handle Palm Random Orbit Power Sander, 5-Inch Electric Sander with 20pcs Sandpapers, Dust Collector for Woodworking
short_description: 3.8 Amp Powerful Motor: HYCHIKA corded random orbital sander with a 3.8 Amp 450W excellent motor, more powerful than a 3 Amp motor, with a maximum speed of 12,000 OPM.

High Dust Collection Efficiency: The high-performance dust bag has more exhaust holes than the dust box to improves dust collection efficiency. Built-in dust collection micro-filtration system. This electric sander also equipment with a vacuum cleaner adapter.

6 Adjustable Speeds: 6 Adjustable speeds dial enables you to match the right speed from sanding to polishing. Suitable for sanding on wood, metal, and plastic or removing paint, and stains of materials. Please not to use this product on drywall or cement plaster.

Low Swing & Vibration: Two ergonomic grips is easy to handle with either 1 or 2 hands, ensure stability over hours of work. Rubber over-mold grip and Precision counterweight design sander to reduce vibration and improve comfort. A shorter height sander reduces the swing, allowing you to get closer to the workpiece.

20 PCS Sandpaper & Quick Change: Hook and loop design enables you to tool-free change the sandpaper quickly. Random orbit sander comes with 20pcs sandpaper from 40/80/120/180/240 grit to meet fine and rough sanding.
Package Included: 1x HYCHIKA Sander, 20x Sandpaper (Include 4x 40 grits, 4x 80 grits, 4x 120 grits, 4x 180 grits, 4x 240 grits), 1x Dust collection bag, 1x Vacuum cleaner adapter, 1x User manual.

name: 3M Random Orbital Sander – Pneumatic Palm Sander – 5” x 3/16” Diam. Orbit – Stikit Disc Pad – For Wood, Composites, Metal – Original Series, 20317
short_description: PROFESSIONAL PERFORMANCE – Powerful 0. 28 HP motor provides enough power for sanding and finishing applications
SMOOTH OPERATION – Precision balanced motor operates smoothly for greater comfort and control
PNEUMATIC POWER – Exceeds the capability of standard electric sanders, supplying hours of continual use
EASY ADHESIVE DISC ATTACHMENT – Includes 3M Stikit disc pad for use with adhesive-backed sanding discs
BUILT FOR DURABILITY – Aluminum body and durable composite cover, reduce the risk of cracked housings and downtime
ERGONOMIC DESIGN – Low-profile, balanced design optimizes ergonomics and performance of 3M sanding abrasives
Special Features: Compact
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use
product_description: Non-vacuum 3M Random Orbital Sanders are air powered sanders designed to deliver professional performance and a swirl-free finish in high-production industrial environments where dust extraction is not required. This palm sander is loaded with features to reduce vibration and noise and increase ergonomics and operator comfort. These features include a comfortable rubber grip and a recessed lever platform that eliminates pinching and pressure points on the operator’s palm. An innovative internal muffler helps reduce noise and won’t break off during use. A Stikit disc pad is included with this 5 inch random orbital sander, allowing the operator to quickly and easily apply adhesive-backed discs to the sanding tool. 3M pneumatic orbital sanders are designed to optimize the performance of 3M abrasives, with speed control and a low-profile, balanced design. 3/16” diameter orbit provides a moderate cut-rate and a fine finish on metal, composites, wood and more. Operates at 90 psi with an air flow rate of 17 SCFM. The 3M™ Random Orbital Sander 20317 non-vacuum tool is air-powered and delivers professional performance and a swirl-free finish hour after hour in high-production industrial environments where dust extraction is not required. Designed to optimize the performance of 3M™ Abrasives, this high-quality 3M tool features a 5" diameter suitable for most applications, and a 3/16" orbit ideal for general purpose operations. Built with a powerful, precision-balanced 0.28 hp motor and durable lightweight aluminum housing, 3M pneumatic random orbital sanders run smoothly and are built to last. Use them with a wide selection of 3M abrasives and accessories. A 3M™ Stikit™ Disc Pad is included. Disc Pad Included for Optimal Performance 3M sanders perform best when paired with 3M disc pads and abrasives. The disc pad included with the tool reduces vibrations for smoother running, provides reliable disc adhesion, and enables optimal performance of the tool. The box includes one 5" 3M Stikit Low Profile Disc Pad 20351 recommended for flat sanding operations, for use with 5" Stikit discs (sold separately). This versatile sander also works with 3M™ Hookit™ disc pads, enabling operators to use Scotch-Brite™ discs in addition to coated abrasive discs. Using Your Pneumatic Sander This tool is intended to be operated as a handheld tool and is air-powered. It requires an air compressor that will provide a clean lubricated air supply with an airflow rate of 17 standard cubic feet per minute (SCFM), or 481 liters per minute (LPM), and 90 pounds per square inch (psi) at the tool, i.e. the point where the air hose is connected to the tool, when the tool is running with the level fully depressed. Recommended is an approved 3/8 inch (10 mm) airline at the minimum length required for the application, with a maximum length of 25 feet (8 m). For more details about connecting the tool to your air supply, see the Instruction Manual. Max RPM is 12,000 at 90 psi. Why Choose a Random Orbital Sander? 3M random orbital sanders optimize sanding and surface preparation on wood, metal, fiberglass and composite materials, and many other substrates. Also known as dual action (D/A) palm sanders, these industrial-grade tools rotate the abrasive disc and disc pad in two simultaneous overlapping oval patterns so no single abrasive particle follows the same path twice, producing a random scratch and swirl-free finish ready for paint or varnish. About 3M Abrasive Systems For more than a century, 3M has applied innovation and technology to improving our customers’ lives and supporting their business goals. Today the company, from its headquarters in St. Paul, Minnesota, serves industrial and commercial customers and consumers in nearly 200 countries. Abrasive Systems products, including a complete line of coated abrasives, microfinishing and microreplicated abrasives, and hardware accessories, provide the finishing touch for almost any surface modification application. The 3M brand, across thousands of products, represents consistency, superior quality, and value. What's in the Box:

name: GALAX PRO 280W 13000OPM Max 6 Variable Speeds Orbital Sander with 15Pcs Sanding Discs, 5” electric Sander with Dust Collector for Sanding and Polishing
short_description: High performance: 280W powerful fine cooper motor provides up to 13,000 rotations per minute, delivering strong power to the sanding disc for dust removal. Ideal for smoothing rough surfaces on wood, metal and/or plastic, removing paint, stain or varnish from wood, metal and/or plastic

Sand large surfaces: This sander machine is equipped with a 125 millimetre diameter sanding pad. This ensures that the user is able to sand even large surfaces and hard materials quickly. The orbital stroke rate of this sander is up to 13,000 opm, while the orbit diameter is 1.25 millimetres

Built-in dust collection system: The dust extraction system and collection bag prevents clouds of dust obstructing your view and makes the clean-up operation a lot less arduous. Simply disconnect the collection bag and dispose of the contents after every use

Ergonomic design: Ergonomically designed handle with rubberised soft grip fits your hand ideally to provide maximum control and comfort. Dust sealed switch minimises contamination with conveniently located lock-on button for continuous use and increase operator comfort
What you get: palm sander; 5Pcs sanding discs of 80 grits, 5Pcs sanding discs of 100 grits, 5Pcs sanding discs of 120 grits; dust collection bag; user manual
